text: tum sabako (aakhir) usee kee taraph lautana hai khuda ka vaayada sachcha hai vahee yaqeenan makhalook ko pahalee marataba paida karata hai phir (marane ke baad) vahee dubaara jinda karega taaki jin logon ne eemaan kubool kiya aur achchhe achchhe kaam kie unako insaaph ke saath jazae (khair) ata pharamaega aur jin logon ne kuphr ekhtiyaar kiya un ke lie unake kuphr kee saza mein peene ko khaulata hua paanee aur dardanaak azaab hoga
